record.id: field.name="tz.type" and file.name="slo" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: tz.type
record.file.name: slo

brief.brief: The time zone to use when processing the Process Target.

detail.detail: System Server (default): If selected (set to true), uses the time zone of the Service Manager server's location.
Technician: If selected (set to true), uses the time zone of the technician's location.
Customer: If selected (set to true), uses the time zone of the customer's location.
CI Location: If selected (set to true), uses the time zone of the configuration item's location.
Specific Value: If selected (set to true), uses a specific time zone.
When this option is true, Service Manager displays another field for additional input.
